item.title: Imperial College Lawn Tennis Club heads to Nice for summer tour!
item.author: Arnaud Legrand,Bartu Ackaba,Diego Vargas Ortiz,Philip Mogul,
item.description: This summer we set out to Nice, France, for our summer tour. Aiming to experience clay-court tennis (a surface we never get to play on in London) we took this opportunity to spend some time together after a successful season. The excitement to play on the top-quality clay courts in Nice was clear as â€¦
